thread.section_title: Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: very comfortable clean and safe
thread.title_full: very comfortable clean and safe - Review of Premier Inn London City (Aldgate) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: sharon l
title: very comfortable clean and safe
text: this is a very comfortable hotel around the corner 1 min from aldgate east tube station. good beds. large tv screens. excellent shower. very clean. nice bar. didnt try restaurant or have breakfast. express check out where you just put your key in a box. you have to use your hotel key to use the lift thus ensuring good security. the only downside is there are no safe facilities in room. nowhere to keep your passport safe. they also give very little in tea/coffee supplies had to keep asking for more. but apart from that extremely comfortable room. pleasant stay. dont order a taxi from reception. they add on commission you get charged alot more. get a local cab number from somebody a local.
